thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Ms Julie Lanigan
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Ms Julie Lanigan

author: Ms Julie Lanigan
title: Ms Julie Lanigan
text: Received a cheaper alternative to what I actually ordered. When I asked to exchange for what I ordered I was told they were sold out and that my only option was either a refund or an exchange. Neither option was what I wanted, the item was clearly not sold out when I bought it and if I was sent that in the first place I would have gotten it. Very disappointing to not receive something I paid for or to receive an explanation as to how to mix up occurred. It felt to me that the item was over sold and that I was given a cheaper alternative in the hopes that I wouldn't notice. Very disappointing experience overall.
